verbose_text: Taken together, we speculate that overexpression of miR-1187 suppresses caspase-8, then down-regulates downstream genes including caspase-3, caspase-7 and caspase-9, consequently attenuating the apoptosis of hepatocytes.
evidence: miR-1187 suppresses caspase-8, then down-regulates downstream genes including caspase-3, caspase-7 and caspase-9, consequently attenuating the apoptosis
